dead-zone.title: Verify organization deletion
dead-zone.deletion-warning-1: If you are sure you want to proceed with deleting the organization
dead-zone.irreversible-operation: This operation is irreversible and will result in the complete deletion of all data associated with the organization.
dead-zone.data-deletion-details: Data such as users, issues, and comments will be permanently deleted.
dead-zone.enter-code-label: Enter the deletion code sent to
dead-zone.acknowledge-checkbox: I acknowledge that all organization data will be deleted and I want to proceed.
